task.title: Preparing the pallet truck for maintenance

step.cmd: Move the pallet truck to a maintenance area with a level floor.
Put the chocks against the wheels to prevent the movement of the pallet truck. Refer to the SAFETY / Control of Hazardous Energy / Lifting and Blocking section
Lockout / tagout the pallet truck. Refer to the SAFETY / Control of Hazardous Energy / Lockout / Tagout Procedures section.
